Dear Santa...

Dear Santa,

This year I've been busy!

In November I ate my brussel sprouts (1 points). In March and I donated clothes to the needy (11 points). In August I bought porn for (-10 points). In April I donated bone marrow to in a life-saving procedure (300 points). Last Saturday I broke 's X-Box (-12 points).

Overall, I've been nice (290 points). For Christmas I deserve a shiny red ball!

Sincerely,
pink_tini

okay im going to confess. gw and i didnt really break it off, we were close tho. gw and i arent moving out of this apt as of now, but deff in Jan. my plan is still to go to Mass but ive been slacking on my apt search. i will still go with or without gw. the issue between us and is son is deff still present but has subsided as of now. gws son came over for halloween, he was dropped off and gw dropped him off after taking him and nat out. i did not make it any more welcoming for him for the fact im just not ready for him to come into our lives. gw cant and wont understand it but he as to or he can walk away. gw doesnt want me writing on this anymore, so i prob wont be that much unless i have something to say about other than our relationship or him, which sucks.
i jump to conclusions to quickly, i like drama obviously.
im addicted to the comp today tho.

george and i have decided to break it off. 4 yrs, 2 kids, and some love involved. ive decided to move to mass alone with the kids, we've also decided silently that we will deff break it off and resume to seeing other ppl to satisfy our needs. im pretty sure i can find a REAL man out there who isnt going to be put me through this much pain and sorrow. this whole issue started over his son, like usual. im done and i know for a fact no other women will pick up what i dropped, good luck george finding another 17 yrs old girl to take my place. believe me, it isnt going to happen with that hair line buddy. anyhow, i should be ballig my eyes out, feeling hurt and betrayed, feeling alone and scared, but im not. i feel empowered, i feel relieved, i feel george will regret his decision one day but ill be happily married to the man of my dreams and he'll be suffering and wondering where his life has gone. he will amount to nothing and i will amount to something. yes i thought it was true love, yes i thought we'd be together forever. but it just isnt meant to be and the signs are more evident now than ever. we are just not meant to be, maybe in a different situation but not now, not here. im fine with it, i can put this roller coaster relationship behind me, believe me its like a nightmare thats over. i can be a single mother and i may not be able to afford much but ill do it. im ready to make my life the way i want it, with or without george, im ready to be a women and pick up my things and move on. one day ill find that man that will steal my heart and we'll be happy together along with my 2 beautiful children. they are so beautiful and loving, no one will have a hard time loving them as i do.
right now i happy, im excited to know i dont have to wear a fake mask anymore. i may love george but im not in love with him anymore, and i seriously cant stand being fake to him anymore. i dont want to be a part of his family, and i prob never will. i have faked this relationship for too long and have hoped george would turn into a better man, it isnt happening and it just wont ever. my prince charming is still awaiting me, somewhere.... im longing for him, i dream of him in my dreams. hmm, what it would be like to have a real man in my life? i know what i want to do differently in my next relationship, believe me ive learnt hard.
i cant believe its been 4 yrs, thank god its not like 15 yrs. haha. im glad im getting out now.

today i feel sorry. i feel sorry for every mother, father, grandparent who has lost a child in their life. i have read so many profiles, journals and myspace pgs with women who have lost their child from SIDS, illness or stillborn/miscarriages/child abuse. today i feel privilaged to have my 2 children here safely with me. today i feel that i should treasue every single day with them, as if it were our last together. who am i to say we'll be here tomorrow? ... sadness fills my heart. when i feel like being lazy, when i get upset or anxious bc i feel over whelmed ill always remember those women out there who cry at night bc they dont have their children with them. even tho my pregnancies werent planned, we love our children just as much and would never regret making the decision we did. 
My children are my best friends... my heart, my soul. I send out my love and prayers to all the women in pain from losing a child.

how can i trust him when he lies about stupid things?? i decided to look in the history thing on the comp to see what has been looked up in the last couple of days. well well, i found a whole search on Rihanna and really exposing pics of her. now i know i didnt do this and its only me and gw living here in this creap apt so i know its him. i always knew he liked her since he masterbates to her... on tv. so  i knew he just would never say it to my face. well well i find this and i feel just totally angry. sounds stupid but i feel stupid in a way, bc i knew it... that he liked her and thought of her in a sexual way... but he just wouldnt say it to my face so why am i getting upset about it? bc i dont like the facts hes looking up pics of her and lieing to me about it. then what else is he doing? i dont know... i just wonder why i keep trusting him and i why i keep thinking we're going to be together forever... and why i would ever marry him. i dont know what else he wants... i tell him we can meet up with another girl, i tell him i LOVE women and that id do anything with him and another women... yes im a little over weight but nothing compared to some ladies who are like 500 lbs over weight. i mean come on, i pleasure him, we have sex, what else does he want? is he just a dirty slob that likes porn too much? obviously he has some sexual issue with masterbating too much also. he does it like 3 times a day and when its his day off he does it as much as possible, i dont know i think its sick. seriously his dick is going to fall off, thats how much he does it. gross. anyhow im pretty upset and i think he owes me a apology and i think i deserve some time to rethink about what really is going on in our relationship.
yes i might have spelt masterbating wrong... who gives a fuck.

pregnancy test says neg. but i feel sooo pregnant and i havent gotten my period yet for this month, so im technically late. wow! i know when ive taken home pregnanct tests in the past they have been neg so ill wait another week and take another one. then if nothing ill have to get my ass to the local clinic and see a doctor. anyhoo other than that, gw has forgotten about the whole issue... thank god... hes been bugging me to look into more birth control methods tho. errr, takes time, money and experiment on my body to see whats going to make me feel good/bad or effect my son who is still nursing.
i bought some christmas stuff from the store down the street. everything was so cheap, so i got some stuff. my mother has been an angel with passing on all her halloween/easter decorations that are soooo nice. but for christmas i dont think ill be that lucky. thank god i dont have a sister bc i would be killing her over my moms stuff lol. even tho my brother may get some nice stuff too, i get the best bc im my momma's baby girl. :)
blah i have nothing to write about, im bored, bored bored.... and kind of emotional today. i feel like a ticking time bomb ready to explode.

hmm. bad news, good news? i think im pregnant. actually gw brought up this issue last night bc he believe i am and i kept saying " no wayyyy" but after him saying it like 2 million times im starting to believe i am. i dont think i pay enough attention to detail and realize my body MAY be telling me im pregnant. haha sounds stupid huh since ive been pregnant twice, i should know. i dont get my period on a reg basis due to a iron problem i have but anyhow i just dont know for sure though. gw is going to bring home a pregnancy test tonight and we'll see who was right and who was wrong. if i am pregnant shit is going to hit the fan haha yes gw will not be a happy camper, but is he ever? he always seems to blame me BUT im not just doing it with myself?? right? it takes two to tango. anyhow that is the latest news, but im not positive yet either. i think in a way im hoping im pregnant but i know that it sounds bad since gw wouldnt be happy, i feel torn. being pregnant is such a happy time though and i love being pregnant. hmm, i dont know how i should feel about this and im not positive im preg yet. ill be sad though if im not, thats reallllllyyyy bad, gw cant know that. :(

i wish i could say my life is perfect but its not and prob never will be. hmm is anyone's life perfect. i feel as if i need to take myself to the hospital and beg for help.... i did qu in my head if i want to tell gw to call in sick tomorrow and take me to get some yummy drugs to just control the constant talking in my head, racing thoughts and overwhelming feeling i get. yes im freakin' nuts but hey! im a fulltime mommy to 2 beautiful children, and im a good mom thank you. i saw dr phil today, made me realize im a better mom than the girl who was on the show... and i watched a really sad video about a abused girl last night on youtube, who actually died at the age 2 bc of her abuser and i realized i need to hug my kids a little bit harder... and i realized i want to help the children in need. but why dont i feel like helping gw's son? bc he is annoying, thats why.

hmm. nothing more and nothing less to say. nothing has changed except for my hormones which were going soooo crazy the last 2 days. no im not pregnant but wish i was. im going through a phase where im seeing my children growing up so fast, especially matthew my little one... and im wanting to have another. too bad gw doesnt want to or otherwise id be pregnant. yes im sad about gw not wanting another one, but im sure i can talk him into it one day soon. it would make me very happy to just have one more precious baby. :(
other than the urge to be pregnant again im just trying to be a mommy to my 2 wonderful kids, that best mommy i can be. yes im not perfect and that bugs me but hell... im trying and ive been very proud of myself lately for doing what i do. yes i give myself pats on the back often. silly huh?

this whole situation with gw's son is really bothering me. i'm not having a good night and feel really out of control. yes, im mentally unhealthy but having "troubles" in my life does NOT help. i have such a hard time getting my point across to gw about his son, its such a touchy subject BUT i have feelings, i have issues with our situation, am i not suppose to voice my feelings? ? ? i'm going to try to write my feelings out and list them, maybe this will relieve me and maybe i can somehow translate this to gw, somehow.
1. why do i have such an issue?? yes in the beginning of our relationship i was really selfish and immature and didnt like the idea that i had to share gw with his son. it didnt help the situation that gw's mother enabled the whole problem by being a full time care taker of his son. this whole care taker issue started way before me. anyhow, i was very selfish but to be honest gw should have been a stronger person, a better father and he should have chose his son over getting head, ass or just being able to be free and handing his son off to his mother/father. i didnt put a gun to gw's head and tell him to choose me over his son, he did that on his own. he made the agreement with his parents about being care takers of his son before i came into the picture bc of work arrangements and the need of having a "life". but i didnt help by being selfish and immature.
2. i can't stand the whole family cirlce, i was raised very differently and to speak the god honest truth i was raised better. even though i had my troubles as a teen, i made my choices as a teen and i knew i what i was doing. my parents did guide me to do the right things, they instilled in me good values and a big heart and open mind. i cannot and will not blame my mom and dad for any of my pain i have from my childhood, or my foolish actions. my parents are very different from gw's parents, and i just cannot face reality that they are not going to change. they are raising gw's son, and in some way you'd have to think that they were very loving, caring and giving ppl if they were raising my bf's son, but they arent. they are selfish also, and they want to control situations as well. they could put the responsibilty in gw's hands but they tell ME one on one that they should have gotten legal custody of gw's son, that they know gw cannot handle him or that he does not want to, that gw and his son have no relationship, and that we should move on and live our lives seperate. but then around the corner gw's mother is crying for help bc to be honest she is too old, too tired and doesnt want to be raising another child. who would be at 50 something yrs old, i wouldnt. but to tell the truth i really believe that gw's son would NOT do good with us bc he is so connected with his grandparents, and he knows no rules/regulations, he knows nothing about a normal structed life, and does not know the word NO. he would have a hell of a time adapting to being by himself to living with 2 other children full time. i believe it would not be healthy for him leaving his home with his grandparents but i cant live inbetween like this.

3. i should be happy he doesnt live with us, that i dont have another mouth to feed, another body to dress, another human to attend to... but im not. im not happy with knowing my bf is torn between his parents/son and our family that we've created. im not happy knowing that when his son is around all rules are broken and put our daughter in danger bc his son cant get the idea that there isnt enough room in the car for him. i cant take knowing he crys like a baby over a pin drop bc his grandparents arent teaching him how to cope with life. im not the first one to say hes over emotional, his school has noticied this also. so why am i so crazy when i say it and why is no one doing anything about it? why does this child at 7 yrs old still sleeping with his grandparents in BED at night EVERYNIGHT?? i dont get this and i dont think its right. but then i feel like im the bad one, i feel like im the evil one. i just dont know if i can do this for the rest of my life, as much as i love gw, i dont want to be in a relationship like this anymore. :( i just cant do it emotionally, god honest truth. im tired, and i dont want to spend my precious time wasting over these issues and trying to change something that will NEVER change, so as i said before, i will not marry gw, even though i love him sooooo much i just will not, i cannot. i hate this bc my feelings are so true inside and i know this bc i can sit here and talk about it without being angry, emotional, except for being sad inside. maybe there is someone out there that could match perfectly with gw but i just cant... i just dont understand sometimes where hes coming from or how he thinks certain things are okay and i just dont have the energy or heart to find out why anymore. i hate to say it but bc of his family/son situation this is what is going to break up apart, and im sure even if i walk away many other women will feel the same. no one would have stayed as long as i have and to be honest no man i know would have put up with my shit as well but seriously a lot of my out bursts and stressfull fights have been bc of his family/son problems, i dont know how to handle, i just cant get a grip on things and i cant handle it anymore. i feel like i should check myself into a hospital, i want to badly bc my mind is so gone and so dead i dont know what to do. i just need to get away from it and it sounds silly and stupid to throw away 4 yrs of love, and friendship but i cant put my mind/body through hell, nor my kids. am i right? or just wrong and stupid, i dont know.

why must gw's son act like a baby?? this kid is 7 yrs old and he acts like he's 1. should i be putting a diaper on him or what? today gw's brother/his wife, gw's mother and son came to our area to grab some lunch. well, it started by gw's son wanting to ride with us. now we have nat and little matthew and we have a small car. it really isnt safe for 3 kids in the back, especially since nat is still in a car seat. well he had to get his way, so there i am putting my daughter in danger of not being in her car seat for his kid who's acting like a baby. its not even about being spoiled just that he does not know how to handle anything without crying, screaming and pouting. this is where i need to put my foot down. he got his way today about it but i cant put my daughter in an unsafe situation in the car for him. no more!!! i told gw there would be no 3 kids in the back seat of the car and there will not be anymore. i hope our talk tonight about it goes well. i have made a deep decision within myself that if gw does/when he asks me to marry him, im going to say NO. yes i know! ive waited this long for the question, i love him, i want to be with him but i just cannot handle his family or son any longer and DO NOT want to spend the rest of my life dealing with it. its all or nothing, either he tells his parents to fuck off and we take his son and move to mass and try to be a happy family or he washes his hand of the kid and just deals with the fact that hes not going to be in his life, bc i cant do this inbetween shit. his parents are too old, too laid back to really be raising him and they are doing things wrong. gw's son crys about things that my 3 yr old daughter laughs about. my daughter looks at him like he's crazy when hes crying. that is bad. i cant handle the baby act, i cant handle how he does not listen, i cant handle how much of a total brat he is, how is lies, how he TRYS to manipulate sitations.... i just cannot do it, and i wont. i love gw a lot and i know he is a good man but i will say no to a marriage proposal and i will walk away from him with our 2 kids. i will not feel like an idiot like i did today and i will not have a child in my life who acts like a total baby, who does unsafe things and does not know what rules/regulations are. his grandparents can ignore his serial killer tendencies but i will not, and sooner or later they will realize being so laid back will bite them in the ass. i have a wasteful sunday and im stressed. i dont want to fight with gw or sound like im being a bitch but i just cannot stand his kid, if he wants to be around me or nat/matt then he needs to act like a human being, like a regular 7 yr old child who is respectful, quiet, and does not talk back or try to change the situation and realizes that NO is NO.

i feel like poop, and prob smell like it too. i need a shower badly. it was really hot earlier so i was sweating my big ass off. hmm, whats making me feel like shit?? maybe bc im mentally ill?? and also that im like 20 pounds over weight, that sounds gay and foolish but being a little fat and unattractive really sucks. i dont have time to get my nails/hair done anymore, i barely have time to shower. i eat wayyyy too much and mostly bc i get bored or upset and stuff my face. i used to be 100 pounds even before my kids and now im like 140 even and i feel like a big fat cow. i hate to see myself naked so i try to keep my eyes closed in the shower, and i keep it dark when my hubby to be and i are getting it on. :) lol. i just feel like poop, i have accomplished nothing today, what a suprise??? i need to have our apartment clean by tomorrow bc gw's family will be here... we have almost no food left in the house, i need to go to the market. gw has waited until the last minute to put new tires on his car for the trip on friday. i cant wait to see my mommy on friday.. :( i miss her so much. i want to just sleep and eat. but i have 2 beautiful kids who need me. i just wish i could get up and clean, im so freakin' lazy.

usually i would be jumping for joy that we're traveling to Mass tomorrow but I'm NOT!! I'm not in a good mood for a number of reasons... one is that gw's mother is driving us to mass and i'm just not in the mood for her leather face, chimeny smoking ass. plus im trying to get my mom to come back up with us to visit and shes being stupid about it. i go OUT of my like 4 hrs to visit her all the time and she cant even come back up with us for a day or two, what the fuck huh? i really wish i didnt have to go to mass tomorrow bc i just DO NOT want to. But i have to, our cars need to be registered and i have to go since they are in my name. sucks ass. i have this pain in my head that wont go away, i think ive had it for a couple of days now. i need to do some house work and i dont want to. im just in a bad fuckin' mood, i feel angry, violent and just out of control. its one of my personality flaws... my internal emotional issues. like a ticking time bomb and it always happens when gw's family is involved in something. god i cannot wait to move to mass where they will not be in my life anymore!!!!!!!!!!!!! ive been looking for apartments and have found a couple. i have to call back this afternoon when the site manager is in.

i feel like i want to strangle someone... someone like... gws mother?? god i hate her.

well we're back from mass and i miss it already. i cried a bit in the truck on the way back to maine. i dont think gw realized i was crying but i was. i cant wait to move back and i get excited thinking about it... gw says we wont be able to afford it without housing but i KNOW that we can and im not going to take that lame excuse as an answer... and i wont take it lieing down. lol that sounded funny but anyhow im just trying to get things back to normal. i have a lot of cleaning to do... and im extra tired today, i had to wake up early to iron gw's clothes for work. so i wish i could fall asleep right now instead im writing on the comp. anyhow i miss my mommy already, i didnt get to spend a lot of time with her bc of my grandmother stealing her away so much. that was the only annoying part of the trip was that my grandmother always wanting to go out and my mom having to take her. my mom says shes going to come to maine to visit us but im not going to hold my breath. other than that my day is boring and its deff colder here in maine than mass and that sucks as well. we did go to canobie lake though and spent like 7 hrs there, we had a lot of fun and in a lot of ways i saw myself falling more in love with gw.... more than i could ever imagine i would. OH and did i mention i saw an old friend that i knew when i was 17, right about the time i met gw i was hanging out with this girl. shes 19 now so shes a tad younger than i am, but shes STILL and prob even worse. she looked horrible and smelt bad... she still smokes and does drugs... she couldnt believe how good i looked nor that i quit smoking. she thought that both kids were beautiful and i could tell she was jealous. NOT that i wanted her to be but i was the lucky one that got away from the program we were in and i was lucky for meeting gw. it was funny though bc she was the same girl and hadnt changed and here i am and ive changed a whole bunch, i couldnt believe it. where would i be without gw, i thought and it made me very thankful for him. i gave him a big hug and kiss and my mom told us how much we've changed for the better. that was deff a wake up call. WOWWOWOWOWOWOWWWW! but yeah im back in maine and hating it. lol. im just counting down the days until we move. :) cant wait!

good, bad and the ugly.... life always has to stab me in the back. last night nat was playing with my notebook coloring in it and she found a pg that had some writing on it and showed it to gw which was a paragraph or two of me venting.. a long time ago. i actually dont remember how long ago it was but it was a while ago. he started reading it innocently but then i yelled at him to stop and he didnt want to... he got upset about it but how could he if those were my thoughts and feelings... he doesnt need to know everything i feel inside?? so he was a little baby the whole night and i didnt give him any sympathy for it nor did i in bed when we fell asleep, nor this morn. so ill wait until he gets home tonight and if hes still being a baby well too bad for him. im not going to say sorry for my thoughts and feelings, i just wont.
hmm tomorrow morn we leave for mass... i have this feeling in the pit of my tummy and it doesnt feel good. i know its going to be a hard weekend for me and its going to be even harder leaving and coming back to maine. i seriously hate maine so much and i miss mass so much. god cant Jan come any quicker. i cant wait until i see the look of gw's parents face when he tells them we're moving back to mass... haha that will be priceless. fuck them, i dont live my life around them or their thoughts/feelings. i know we're going to be much happier in mass where we belong. 
anyhow i just know this weekend is going to be hard on me, especially since we're cutting the visit short and coming back to maine on sunday instead of monday... errr. i was having a couple of good days but today i feel like shit and just dont care. i feel like time is killing me and going as slow as hell. lets hope i can get my ass up tomorrow morn, we need to leave at like 7-8ish in the morn... we have to stop in everett, ma at our old place to get some stuff/mail from chris. im deff going to take a lot of pics though.. pics will help me cope until Jan... ill post them on here and cafemom to share with anyone who cares.

i have an obsession with cafemom.com. yes i will say it, i know it. i found this website i cant remember how but i found it the other day and have been hooked ever since which has left me to neglect poor livejournal.
well. exciting news... not really. our 2 cars are suppose to be towed tomorrow by maintence. it shows how stupid ppl are around here. all the car needs is a little tlc and about $100 and it would be running, i even said i would trade for a xbox 360, thats how badly i needed someone to take the off of my hands but NO. so gw has decided that we're going to just get both cars fixed and yes at VIP, the nightmare place that got my car where it is today. he says he'll make sure they don't fuck up this time, they better not or this time i will go down there and shove my car up their asses for sure. so this mean't i had to call the landlord lady who was real nice today. BUT im having trouble not having them tow them, i said i would have them towed asap but i guess maintence has special powers now. im telling ya, if a tow truck shows up that isnt for VIP im going to flip and there will be police here. god i hate living in an apartment especially in maine... in mass my car wouldnt be gone in like 1 day. anyhow gw thought of this stupid idea of just driving his car to his parents BUT its not registered and has 3 flat tires. so yeah his parents house is like 25 mins away, thats not smart is it? so i told him NO and i said just get it towed to VIP to get fixed before we leave for mass. if the car gets fixed before friday morn we could take it to mass with us, better than renting or taking the work truck.
my grandparents should be in boston around 4pm i hope they did okay. my parents arent home so i cant see if everything is okay. err. but im sure my mom will email me some good news. other than that im just getting more excited and anxious about 2 things...
1. going to mass for a vaca, god i miss massachusetts sooooo much!
2. the red sox play the yankees tonight and we are going to kick new yorks ass! they lost 16-0 last night against the detroit tigers. suck that!
game starts at 7pm, 3 day series if we beat them out of this, sweep them they prob wont make the finals. hahaha

I've been drawn to this site called cafemom. I've been trying to put together a mom's group for my area and its horrible. i cant find anyone except for the brunswick area which is great but i live like almost 2 hrs from there. so good luck to me huh?
